short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an HTML5 audio streaming control to all pages on C895.org.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds an HTML5 <audio> player to all pages on www.c895.org, allowing you to start the C89.5FM audio stream with one click from any page.
